transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Abhinav sir, Himanshu baat kar raha hun. Good afternoon India Mart se.
Executive: Parso baat hui thi kal Sneha ne bhi shayad aapko call kiya hoga.
Executive: Sir wo PDF vagaira bhijwa diya tha aapko final quotation?
Customer: Sir maine apne boss ko bhej diya hai wo quotation jaise unki taraf se koi approval ho jayega main aapko call back karunga.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai ek baar dekh lijiyega sir date wo apna aage na 14th March.
Executive: Jaise wo update denge aapko main aapko call kar dunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Approval pending from boss regarding quotation.



Resolution:

- Executive will wait for customer's call back after approval.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back after approval from boss.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

quotation, approval, follow up
